name: Gondola's Shop
description:
This game was made for the 2021 Mini Jam 75: Wisdom. 

Gondola just opened his new shop. Help him out in his first day, you can use counterfeit weights to get some extra coins or you can run your business in an honest way.

There are two secret achivements, shown in the ending screen.

Note: don't spam left click on the arrow of the dialoge box, it can softlock the game or make the character spawning stop :( I'm working on it... Just click it slowly and very gently.
